channel.title: I added the id for the dragon full helm in my source and it didnt work
channel.description:
i need more help getting the silabsoft ids in when i placed the dragon full helm id in it didn't work and im not sure if i did it right either all i did was go to item.java and add the ID in this
public static int fullHelm[] =
and that is it was there more that i have to do or was that correct? :confused:

item.title: I added the id for the dragon full helm in my source and it didnt work
item.dc:creator: @games-for-pros games-for-pros
item.description:
@games-for-pros wrote:

ok if u dont have item4

then this is what u do:

add the item id to the folowing lists:

-public static int hats[]
-public static int fullHelm[]
-public static int fullMask[]
save and compile. tell me if it works

Read full topic

item.title: I added the id for the dragon full helm in my source and it didnt work
item.dc:creator: @games-for-pros games-for-pros
item.description:
@games-for-pros wrote:

i put the item under hats, full helm, full mask and it worked. if that doesnt work check if u have item.java and item4.java. Make sure that you put under: hat, full helm, full mask in all of them. in both files
